participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my ability to stay calm under pressure.
i drink lots of iced tea.
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
my favorite band is worn.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.

participant_2.background:
I miss the days when I could afford to drive my own car.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
I am in recovery from alcoholism and my pets are a great support.
I am from a small town where the beach is my favorite place to relax and read.
my mother was a single mother.

content.text: Hi!  What's your favorite sport to play?
I love football!  I'm actually in recovery from alcoholism, and football has been a huge part of my recovery.
That's great to hear!  I'm glad you've found something that's helped you on your journey.
Thanks!  How about you, what's your favorite sport to play?
I'm not much of an athlete, to be honest.  I enjoy playing board games and video games though.
Ah, I see!  I'm not very athletic either, but I love watching sports.  Who's your favorite football team?
I'm a big fan of the Philadelphia Eagles!  They're a bit of a disappointment this year, but I'm still rooting for them.
Oh, I know what you mean!  I'm a fan of the Pittsburgh Steelers, and we've been pretty disappointing this year too.
Well, hopefully we can both enjoy some playoff football this year!
Fingers crossed!  I know it's a long shot, but I'm still holding out hope.
Me too!  It's always more fun to watch the games when your team is in them.
Absolutely!  Well, it was nice chatting with you!  Have a good night!
